title: Companion Approval Guide
content: nce in the Dialogue with Spike Lae'zel +Astarion + Wyll -Karlach -Gale - LiamTorturer Spike Goblin Camp ,Shattered Sanctum - As you enter, turn right and keep going that direction to meet Liam and Spike Every instance of Successful Torture on Liam, repeatable. Requirement/s: You only get approval if your torture method is effective. Ineffective Torture methods like the Stretching choice or insults does not give approval/disapprova Lae'zel +Astarion + Wyll -Karlach -Gale - LiamTorturer Spike Gobl
